alert.note: Alert for Greene; Wayne (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 05 at 9:53AM CDT until April 05 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Monroe County in south central Alabama... North central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama... Washington County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Clarke County in southwestern Alabama... Southeastern Wayne County in southeastern Mississippi... Northeastern Greene County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 1045 AM CDT. * At 952 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of State Line to 3 miles east of Fruitdale to 7 miles north of Leakesville, moving east at 70 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Chatom, Wagarville, Deer Park, Tibbie, State Line, Fruitdale and McIntosh. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 PM CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...and southeastern Mississippi.
